net.opentsdb.auth

接口 Authorization

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AllowAllAuthenticatingAuthorizer

    public interface Authorization
    A plugin interface for authorization calls, allowing or disallowing operations in OpenTSDB.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.4

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      AuthState allowQuery(AuthState state, Query query)
      Determines if the user is allowed to execute the given query.
      AuthState allowQuery(AuthState state, TSQuery query)
      Determines if the user is allowed to execute the given query.
      void collectStats(StatsCollector collector)
      Called by the TSD when a request for statistics collection has come in.
      AuthState hasPermission(AuthState state, Permissions permission)
      Determines if the user has a specified permission
      void initialize(TSDB tsdb)
      Called by TSDB to initialize the plugin Implementations are responsible for setting up any IO they need as well as starting any required background threads.
      com.stumbleupon.async.Deferred<Object> shutdown()
      Called to gracefully shutdown the plugin.
      String version()
      Should return the version of this plugin in the format: MAJOR.MINOR.MAINT, e.g. 2.0.1.

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        void initialize(TSDB tsdb)
        Called by TSDB to initialize the plugin Implementations are responsible for setting up any IO they need as well as starting any required background threads. Note: Implementations should throw exceptions if they can't start up properly. The TSD will then shutdown so the operator can fix the problem. Please use IllegalArgumentException for configuration issues.
        参数:
        tsdb - The parent TSDB object
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if required configuration parameters are missing
        RuntimeException - if something else goes wrong

      • shutdown

        com.stumbleupon.async.Deferred<Object> shutdown()
        Called to gracefully shutdown the plugin. Implementations should close any IO they have open
        返回:
        A deferred object that indicates the completion of the request. The Object has not special meaning and can be null (think of it as Deferred<Void>).

      • version

        String version()
        Should return the version of this plugin in the format: MAJOR.MINOR.MAINT, e.g. 2.0.1. The MAJOR version should match the major version of OpenTSDB the plugin is meant to work with.
        返回:
        A version string used to log the loaded version

      • collectStats

        void collectStats(StatsCollector collector)
        Called by the TSD when a request for statistics collection has come in. The implementation may provide one or more statistics. If no statistics are available for the implementation, simply stub the method.
        参数:
        collector - The collector used for emitting statistics

      • hasPermission

        AuthState hasPermission(AuthState state,
                        Permissions permission)
        Determines if the user has a specified permission
        参数:
        state -
        permission -
        返回:

      • allowQuery

        AuthState allowQuery(AuthState state,
                     TSQuery query)
        Determines if the user is allowed to execute the given query. The returned state contains a status code regarding whether or not the query is allowed. If the query IS allowed, the same user state passed as an argument maybe returned.
        参数:
        state - A non-null auth state with the user and AuthStatus.SUCCESS.
        query - A non-null query.
        返回:
        An AuthState object with a valid AuthStatus to evaluate for permission.

      • allowQuery

        AuthState allowQuery(AuthState state,
                     Query query)
        Determines if the user is allowed to execute the given query. The returned state contains a status code regarding whether or not the query is allowed. If the query IS allowed, the same user state passed as an argument maybe returned.
        参数:
        state - A non-null auth state with the user and AuthStatus.SUCCESS.
        query - A non-null query.
        返回:
        An AuthState object with a valid AuthStatus to evaluate for permission.
